QuestData.Title: The Young Lord Stormsong
QuestData.Description: When the town fell, I got separated from my charge.$b$bLord Stormsong is being held hostage in his own house. I should've been there to protect him.$b$bWhen you go in there, succeed where I failed. Bring him back safely.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Once a respected administrator, it seems Conway grew tired of Brannon's "leadership".
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Brother Conway, then rescue Lord Brannon Stormsong from Anglepoint Packing District.
QuestData.CompletionText: I have failed in my duty as a guard.
QuestData.RewardText: <Alby clears his throat.>$b$bIt is good to see the young lord safe.$b$b...Thanks.
